ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 197
ygData.msgSnippet: Humm Imps. Hoping my guild will make a run for the Imps of Firegiants soon heh. Little off topic here specially on an enchanter board, but look me up next time
ygData.messageBody:
Humm Imps. Hoping my guild will make a run for the Imps of Firegiants soon
heh. Little off topic here specially on an enchanter board, but look me up
next time yer hunting imps or firegiants and need any help. My primary char
on Veeshan is a lvl 46 Necro. Enchanter is on a diff server and doesn't get
played much any more.

Klayan Deathbringer
The Oracle


>From: Andrew Collins <ACollins@...>
>Reply-To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
>To: "'eqenchanters@onelist.com'" <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
>Subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Digest Number 197
>Date: Mon, 13 Dec 1999 09:13:49 -0600
>
>
>I would just like to add that the new mes series change rocks!
>Goodbye mesmerize forever! See, I used to always use enthrall, but I would
>add mes to my list as a back up in case enthrall was resisted, so i didn't
>have to wait 5 seconds for a recast. I also used both when fighting tough
>battles such as the Ghoul Lord or King. AE mesmerization is reserved for
>trains, and weaker mobs. I learned my lesson when I tried to AE mesmerize 5
>Imp Protectors. With everyone resisting and knocking me dead in a little
>over 1 round (they were all red to me at the time). Instead, when fighting
>really tough battle I pick them off 1 at a time, that way if it is resisted
>I only have to deal with 1 mob attacking me at a time. And with 4 other
>Imps
>beating on my party I need to act quickly.
>
>So now I have Entrance as my main spell, and Enthrall as a back up, and in
>1
>level I will be using Dazzle/Entrance. I can't wait to use dazzle, because
>entrance has kept most things entranced for 60+ seconds.
>
>-Maelael, 48th Enchanter
>-Veeshan
><< text3.html >>
